transcript: Yes, I know you did you threw an out of the window into the grand canal. I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that

segments.text: Yes, I know you did you threw an out of the window into the grand canal. I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I know you did. You threw it out of the window into the Grand Canal; I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.
